title: HMSI rolls out industry's first warranty programme
description: The initiative offers customers three flexible options: a 3-year policy for vehicles up to 7th year of age, a 2-year policy for vehicles in their 8th year, and a 1-year policy for vehicles in their 9th year. These options provide coverage for up to 1.2 lakh kilometers for all scooter models and up to 1.3 lakh kilometers for all motorcycle models.
